category: Obstructing or impeding the flow of an inland water
description: At all times during the construction of the <<dam, weir, lake, pond, reservoir etc>>, the total flow of the <<water body name>> immediately upstream of the <<lake/pond/reservoir>> site shall be allowed to by-pass the <<lake/pond/reservoir>> and shall be returned to the <<water body name>><< immediately downstream/NGR>> of the impounding works. This flow shall be known as the By-pass Flow.
